# Government Tender Announcement: Security Guard Services
### Published on: March 22, 2024 (French Publication Date: 2024-03-22)
### Closing Date for Tenders: April 19, 2024 at 14:00:00
### Solicitation Number: RFP002428

### Tender Description

Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) is seeking proposals for Security Guard Services for multiple locations across Canada. The contract period will be for 3 years from September 27, 2024, to September 26, 2027, with an irrevocable option to extend for up to 2 additional one-year periods.

### Important Information
* The contract award will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.
* This solicitation contains a security requirement.
* Tenderers must meet the requirements outlined in the attached documents.

### Tender Details

* Tender Title: RFP for Security Guard Services (French: DP pour des services d'agents de sécurité)
* Tender Number: cb-871-38390785 (French: cb-871-38390785)
* Modification Number: 4 (French: numéroModification: 4)
* Classification: SRV (Service)
* Category: Security Guard Services

### Procurement Requirements

* Location: Multiple sites across Canada (English: Montreal, Toronto, Halifax, Vancouver, Ottawa; French: Montréal, Toronto, Halifax, Vancouver, Ottawa; etc.)
* Services: Security Guard services for CMHC facilities and assets
* Duration: 3 years from September 27, 2024, to September 26, 2027, with an option to extend for up to 2 additional one-year periods

### Tender Documents
Tender documents can be downloaded from the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities). Tenderers are responsible for regularly consulting GETS for the most up-to-date information.

### Contact Information

* Contact Email: dlaberge@cmhc-schl.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: (613) 748-4794
* Contact Address: 700 Montreal Road, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0P7
* Contact Fax: (Not provided)  ### Attachments
